attributes.action: make the purchase of clipboards more accessible to the general public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Clipboards are an essential feature of modern life. In as much as they are not now available from Woolworth's, we urgently request that the Prime Minister considers legislation to encourage all retailers where at all practicable to stock them at a marginal price.

It must be noted that petitions are of invaluable service to the functioning of a truly democratic nation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
